title: How to Make a Rum Cake

steps.headline: You'll want to pre-heat your oven to 325 degrees.
Grease and flour your Bundt pan.
Sprinkle nuts on the bottom of the pan.
Mix all of the cake ingredients together and using a mixer for two (2) minutes.
Pour batter over nuts and bake for one (1) hour.
Let it cool and then invert it onto a serving plate.
Spoon glaze evenly over the top and sides in medium amounts.
steps.description: Let the cake absorb it for about 5 minutes and then add more layers until glaze is used up.

steps.headline: Get a tall glass of milk, find some friends or family, and enjoy!
Stir in water, sugar, and rum.
Boil for five (5) minutes, stirring constantly.

text: For the Cake You'll want to pre-heat your oven to 325 degrees.  Grease and flour your Bundt pan.  Sprinkle nuts on the bottom of the pan.  Mix all of the cake ingredients together and using a mixer for two (2) minutes.  Pour batter over nuts and bake for one (1) hour.  Let it cool and then invert it onto a serving plate.  Spoon glaze evenly over the top and sides in medium amounts. Let the cake absorb it for about 5 minutes and then add more layers until glaze is used up. Get a tall glass of milk, find some friends or family, and enjoy!  For Glaze Melt butter in a saucepan.  Stir in water, sugar, and rum.  Boil for five (5) minutes, stirring constantly. Then remove from heat. Drizzle over cake.  Finished.
